item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

Where: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd., Waltham, MA

Feb 21, 2008 - Monthly Meeting

CURTIS BROOKS - "The Real Estate Bubble has burst and it's time to celebrate - Learn the ins and outs of Shortsales and Learn what the Loss Mitigators REALLY WANT to GET THE DEAL DONE!"


Feb 23 PM - SATURDAY - ALL DAY TRAINING - Learn the ins and outs of Shortsales as told by Loss Mitigators. Learn systems that will allow you to help people and capitalize on a downturning market!

8:00 AM

8:30 AM - 4:30 - Meeting

Cost: Members - pre-registration - $49, spouse/partner - $30
Visitor pre-registration - $99, spouse/partner - $40
At the door EVERYONE pays $99

Location: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association
